name: soccerlive
description: an extension to get live soccer score

soccer-live.includedLeague.markdownDescription:
Specifies which league info should be displayed. Defaults to "42, 47, 54, 87".
Code Table:

soccer-live.format.markdownDescription:
Specifies how the game info should be displayed. Defaults to `"${hTeam} ${hScore} : ${vScore} ${vTeam}, ${liveTime}"`, which looks like `Man United 2 : 1 Crystal Palace, 21:48`. The available wildcards are:
- `${hTeam}`: The home team's abbreviated name, (e.g. `"Man United"`)
- `${hScore}`: The home team's score
- `${vTeam}`: The visiting team's abbreviated name, (e.g. `"Crystal Palace"`)
- `${vScore}`: The visiting team's score
- `${status}`: The live time of the game
`

soccer-live.detailFormat.markdownDescription:
Specifies how the game detail should be displayed. Defaults to `"${time}'  (${team}) ${player} ${type} (${desc})"`, which looks like `34'  (home) Messi (Long Shoot)`. The available wildcards are:
- `${time}`: The event time.
- `${team}`: The event team
- `${player}`: The player involved in the event
- `${type}`: The type of event, (e.g. "Goal")
- `${desc}`: The description of the event. (e.g, "Header")

soccer-live.hover.markdownDescription: Specifies what to show when hovering over the ticker. Options are `"details"` (details about the current game) or `"scoreboard"` (all scores).

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
